Actions.description: The available actions for this Resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.

enumDescriptions.Other: A other class.  The function Device Class Id needs to be verified.

Links.description: The links to other Resources that are related to this Resource.
Links.longDescription: This Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to Resources that are related to but are not contained by or subordinate to this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Drives.description: An array of links to the drives that the PCIe device produces.
Drives.longDescription: This property shall link to a Resource of type Drive that represents the storage drives associated with this Resource.

EthernetInterfaces.description: An array of links to the Ethernet interfaces that the PCIe device produces.
EthernetInterfaces.longDescription: This property shall link to a Resource of type EthernetInterface that represents the network interfaces associated with this Resource.

NetworkDeviceFunctions.description: An array of links to the network device functions that the PCIe device produces.
NetworkDeviceFunctions.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to Resources of the NetworkDeviceFunction type that represents the network device functions associated with this Resource.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PCIeDevice.description: The link to the PCIe device on which this function resides.
PCIeDevice.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a Resource of type PCIeDevice of which this function is a part.

StorageControllers.description: An array of links to the storage controllers that the PCIe device produces.
StorageControllers.longDescription: This property shall link to a Resource of type StorageController that represents the storage controllers associated with this Resource.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PCIeFunction.description: The schema definition for the PCIeFunction Resource.  It represents the properties of a PCIeFunction attached to a System.
PCIeFunction.longDescription: This Resource shall represent a PCIeFunction attached to a System.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this Resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this Resource.

ClassCode.description: The Class Code of this PCIe function.
ClassCode.longDescription: This property shall contain the PCI Class Code of the PCIe device function.

DeviceClass.description: The class for this PCIe function.
DeviceClass.longDescription: This property shall contain the device class of the PCIe device function, such as storage, network, or memory.

DeviceId.description: The Device ID of this PCIe function.
DeviceId.longDescription: This property shall contain the PCI Device ID of the PCIe device function.

FunctionId.longDescription: This property shall contain the PCIe Function Number within a given PCIe device.

FunctionType.description: The type of the PCIe function.
FunctionType.longDescription: This property shall contain the function type of the PCIe device function such as Physical or Virtual.

Links.description: The links to other Resources that are related to this Resource.
Links.longDescription: This property shall contain links to Resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this Resource.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

RevisionId.description: The Revision ID of this PCIe function.
RevisionId.longDescription: This property shall contain the PCI Revision ID of the PCIe device function.

Status.description: The status and health of the Resource and its subordinate or dependent Resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the Resource.

SubsystemId.description: The Subsystem ID of this PCIe function.
SubsystemId.longDescription: This property shall contain the PCI Subsystem ID of the PCIe device function.

SubsystemVendorId.description: The Subsystem Vendor ID of this PCIe function.
SubsystemVendorId.longDescription: This property shall contain the PCI Subsystem Vendor ID of the PCIe device function.

VendorId.description: The Vendor ID of this PCIe function.
VendorId.longDescription: This property shall contain the PCI Vendor ID of the PCIe device function.

title: #PCIeFunction.v1_2_3.PCIeFunction
